text:
="preserve">Michael Kindo (20 June 1947 – 31 December 2020) was an Indian field hockey player. He was born in Jharkhand, India. He represented India in 1972 Summer Olympics and won the bronze medal. He was a member of the team that won the World Cup in 1975.
Kindo died on 31 December 2020 at the age of 73.
